title: FS - T206 Beater Lot including 4 HOF's
author: Natedog

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Beater Lot including 4 HOF's
posts.post_content:
Hi all - for sale is a lot of 12 T206's, including 4 HOF's, all in poor condition.  The creasing on most of them is pretty evident in the pics.  On the Matty Portrait, the crease going through his head is so severe that the card is actually TORN about 1/3 of the way from the left border.  This one is quite fragile.  The Huggins looks like someone/something was snacking on the bottom border.  Fred Merkle has writing on the back.  The Ames portrait has discoloration along the right border.  And yes, poor Tommy Leach has a hole right through his chest.  Needless to say, these cards have issues.  

Price is SOLD, delivered net to me for the dirty dozen.  I'd also be up for a trade.  I collect mostly T206's, but have other pre-war interests as well.

Claim in thread or PM me with your email if you want better pics.

Thanks,
Anthony
IF they're available I'll take them.
Assuming Scott has them now.....I'll put my name next just in case

The deal fell through, so they are yours if you still want them.
